subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: William Buford scored 21 points, and No. 3 Ohio State weathered visiting Florida’s fast start to beat the seventh-ranked Gators, 81-74.
snippet: William Buford scored 21 points, and No. 3 Ohio State weathered visiting Florida’s fast start to beat the seventh-ranked Gators, 81-74.
